description.narrative: * 300 women can come out of home 2 days a week to learn, share and enjoy their time in our community centers. * 300 completely illiterate women now can read ,write ,counting numbers and calculated the basics additions and subtractions. * Women are considering personal and environmental hygiene with resulted in less illness among the household level. * Women are well aware of peace and they know how to resolve conflicts at community level. * Women has gotten confident to talk in the community. * 3oo women gained knowledge in business skill

Laghman and Uruzgan are 2 provinces located in east & central region of Afghanistan. The long-standing conflict has damaged the social and physical infrastructure of both provinces. The adverse victims of these are women who have become the ignored segment of society. This project aims to strengthen woman cooperative development in agriculture & entrepreneurial woman farmers.

The project objective is to build the capacity of women’s organizations and local authorities in Laghman & Uruzgan and create an enabling environment for building local structures & networks to support and sustain flourishing communities.
* Utilize locally built structures & funds for women to implement small agricultural projects

participating-org.narrative: Skills Training and Rehabilitation Society STARS
